title: TUESDAY 6/15 - TREVOR LAWERENCE ON THE MEND
itunes:title: TUESDAY 6/15 - TREVOR LAWERENCE ON THE MEND
description:
Patriots CB Stephon Gilmore (0:08) holding out in New England, while Cam Newton (1:15) healing up for minicamp. Jets wide receiver Jamison Crowder (1:26) renegotiates his contract. Vikings defensive end Danielle Hunter (1:47) gets a new deal. Jaguars quarterback Trevor Lawrence (2:24) and his injured hamstring healing up as he looks to master the Jaguars offense

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
